summary: Completed comprehensive testing of task assignment UI updates with Assignee/Co-assignee fields and Department toggle buttons. All features working correctly with proper backend integration.

Backend API - Task creation with assignee and co-assignee

Frontend UI - Departments column in users table

Frontend UI - Task creation form with Co-assignee dropdown
Frontend UI - Department toggle buttons for task categorization
Integration - Frontend to backend user creation with departments
Integration - Frontend to backend task creation with assignees
Integration - Department data persistence and display
